reviews.review_msg: not a good prof, but a nice and funny lady. Needs to come to class more organized, she jumps ALL over the place. Also walks and talks like she is a Goldman MD, she needs to explain concepts more clear and properly cover content.

This woman has been teaching for a VERY long time. You can tell in the way she assumes that students know certain things, that even the best of the best would have forgotten or not had the chance to learn. Overall, she is very knowledgeable, but you just have to work closely with her in order to get the best out of her. Great class overall.
